豑字的基本解释

豑
zhì
爵（古代一种礼器）的顺序。

豑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直一切，入質，澄。］
同“秩1”。
爵位的次第。

豑字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豆字部】　豑； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1193第24
【廣韻】直一切【集韻】直質切，?音秩。【說文】爵之次第也。【書·堯典】平秩東作。【說文】引作豑。【字彙補】古秩字。

豑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
豑字的起名意思

爵位的次第。

豑
Basic explanation of words
豑
zhì
The order of Jue (an ancient ritual vessel).
豑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" straightens everything, enters the quality, and clarifies. ]
Same as "rank 1".
The order of knighthood.
豑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Bean Character Department] 　豑; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1193 Page 24
[Guang Yun] Straight Everything [Ji Yun] Straight quality cut, sound rank. [Said the text] Jue is also the second. 【Book·Yaodian】Ping Zhidong made. [Said the text] quoted as Feng. 【Word Supplement】Ancient rank words.
